name: Muhammad Fahim
content: Muhammad Fahim - Queen's University Belfast View Scopus Profile Muhammad Fahim Dr Senior Lecturer, School of Electronics, Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Phone+44 (0)28 9097 5431EmailM.Fahimqub.acuk Room 01.003 - Computer Science BuildingUnited Kingdom 20102025 Research activity per year Personal profile Research InterestsMy research interest includes AI in healthcare with a primary focus on healthy aging. My core expertise includes machine & deep learning models, time-series prediction, and data analytics. I am also interested in collaborating in multidisciplinary research projects to embed AI with societal impact. Fingerprint Dive into the research topics where Muhammad Fahim is active. These topic labels come from the works of this person.
